attributes.action: Give the Ghurka's Residency  They have earned it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Gordon Brown, 

This petition is to remaind you that there are people on this planet who "serve" and expect nothing that is not earned. 13 Victoria Cross medals and over 200 years service to the armed forces and protecting Her Majesty the Queen. 

Where do your ethics lie?

Your predecessor wilfully re-housed the entire contents of the Songat Refugee camp in France to the North of England (very kindly) and yet I would have preferred the Ghurka's living next door to be honest.

Please don't disgrace our flag in the eyes of the Brave Ghurka's

Respectfully
James Berry (Sir)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
